title: The truth about geedee.boards.net
body:
Note: Before you read, please note that I am posting this by myself with no backing from the other members of the board, we already had a recruitment thread by Maximum Riven, a moderator from geedee.  Please read before downvoting, downvotes are fine if you read and don't agree with the content. These are my attempts to disprove some possibly floating rumors about the forums. I'm trying to do it to the best of my ability which isn't that good.

Dear General Discussion inhabitants, I want to help clean up any misconceptions about geedee that you may have, i've heard there were some rumors about it that I want to confirm or correct. 

Geedee **DOES** have moderators who are regulars of the thread who post regularly and are a part of the community posting often. We **don't **allow hentai, porn, or any other sexually explicit material. We are a healthy community discussing multiple topics, we **are not** completely comprised of circlejerks or anything of the sort. The community is growing and posting discussion promoting threads. 

I'm here to answer any lingering questions to the best of my ability. 

If you want to see for yourself, here's a link. [](http://geedee.boards.net/board/1/general-board)
I'm not sure if that link will show, so here's a copy and pasted one. 
http://geedee.boards.net/board/1/general-board

If you are interested, please see for yourself. Thanks for reading the thread.
